name: Undaunted
summary: Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way.
description:
Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against emotion effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Leshy: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.
